thread.title: BRIEF-Silver Spruce Resources Cancels Proposed Private Placement And Termination Of Agreement With M Securities

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Silver Spruce Resources Cancels Proposed Private Placement And Termination Of Agreement With M Securities
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - Silver Spruce Resources Inc:
* SILVER SPRUCE RESOURCES INC. ANNOUNCES CANCELLATION OF THE PROPOSED PRIVATE PLACEMENT AND TERMINATION OF THE AGREEMENT WITH M SECURITIES LIMITED
* SILVER SPRUCE RESOURCES -‍ M SECURITIES LIMITED HAS BEEN UNABLE TO COMPLETE PRIVATE PLACEMENT THAT COMPANY PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED ON DEC 11, 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
